app.title: Question Pro AI
app.tagline: Enhance your problem-solving skills with powerful business frameworks

mece.title: MECE Framework
mece.description: A method of organizing information that ensures issues are Mutually Exclusive (ME) and Collectively Exhaustive (CE)
mece.concepts: Mutually Exclusive, Collectively Exhaustive, Logical Grouping, Structured Analysis
mece.applications: Problem breakdown, Root cause analysis, Complete analysis

designThinking.title: Design Thinking
designThinking.description: A human-centered approach to innovation that draws from the designer's toolkit to integrate the needs of people, the possibilities of technology, and the requirements for business success
designThinking.applications: Product design, Service design, User experience optimization

swot.title: SWOT Analysis
swot.description: A strategic planning technique used to help identify strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats related to business competition or project planning
swot.applications: Strategic planning, Competitive analysis, Market positioning

portersFiveForces.title: Porter's Five Forces
portersFiveForces.description: A framework for analyzing a company's competitive environment, helping to determine the competitive intensity and market attractiveness
portersFiveForces.concepts: Competition, New entrants, Substitutes, Supplier power, Buyer power
portersFiveForces.applications: Industry analysis, Strategic positioning, Market entry decisions

firstPrinciples.title: First Principles Thinking
firstPrinciples.description: The practice of breaking down complex problems into basic elements and then reassembling them from the ground up
firstPrinciples.concepts: Fundamental truths, Basic assumptions, Reasoning from scratch

blueOcean.title: Blue Ocean Strategy
blueOcean.description: A business theory that suggests companies are better off searching for ways to gain uncontested market space rather than competing in existing markets
blueOcean.concepts: Value innovation, Uncontested market space, Market creation
blueOcean.applications: Market strategy, Product differentiation, Business model innovation

scamper.title: SCAMPER
scamper.description: A creative thinking technique that helps generate new ideas by considering changes to existing products or services
scamper.concepts: Substitute, Combine, Adapt, Modify, Put to other uses, Eliminate, Reverse
scamper.applications: Product development, Process improvement, Creative problem-solving

problemTree.title: Problem-Tree Analysis
problemTree.description: A visual method for analyzing problems by mapping out cause and effect relationships around an issue
problemTree.concepts: Core problem, Root causes, Effects, Causal relationships
problemTree.applications: Development planning, Project design, Social interventions

pareto.title: Pareto Principle
pareto.description: The principle that roughly 80% of effects come from 20% of causes
pareto.applications: Time management, Resource allocation, Quality control, Customer service

jobsToBeDone.title: Jobs-To-Be-Done
jobsToBeDone.description: A framework for understanding customer needs by focusing on the 'job' they are trying to accomplish
jobsToBeDone.applications: Product innovation, Marketing strategy, Customer experience design

settings.title: Settings
settings.changeLanguage: Change the language for all app content
settings.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
